item.author: Cyo
item.description: ZRP(区域半径协议)详解 1.默认配置参数Constants.h #ifndef _constants_h_ #define _constants_h_ // General OR Common Constants //DEBUG 参数 #define DEBUG 0 // 1 = Enabled; 0 = Disabled //Router_PORT #define ROUTER_PORT 0xff #define TRUE 1 #define FALSE 0 #define LINKUP 1 #define LINKDOWN 0
